Title: Energy firms challenge Venture Global’s request to extend plant commissioning of Calcasieau Pass
Description: At least three energy companies have filed motions to intervene with the Federal Energy Regulatory Committee (FERC) in the US, challenging Venture Global’s recent request to extend its 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG plant’s already delayed commissioning for another year until 2025.
Author: JS

Title: Tangguh Train 3 resumes operations after technical issues
Description: The 3.8 mtpa third train of the BP-operated 11.4 mtpa Tangguh LNG plant in Indonesia has resumed operations after shutting down due to technical issues last week.
Author: CK

Title: West Australian domestic gas policy may no longer be fit for purpose: Parliamentary committee
Description: Western Australia’s domestic gas policy aimed at ensuring the state’s long-term energy needs may no longer be fit for purpose, with forecasts for gas supply shortfalls indicating that there may even be a case for government intervention, according to an interim report released by the Western Australian Parliament’s Economics and Industry Standing Committee today on its inquiry into the policy’s continued viability.
Author: CK
